Articles.Content: Multiplayer for sure, exploring with friends must be so much fun, especially when you deliberately sabotage them!
I'm excited 2  where no  has gone before...
Excited to stran.. - I mean perform many successful missions in the new game, also colonies!

3 minutes ago, whatsEJstandfor said:

 

I hope it's not bad that I also already entered in the Discord.

 

This is not the same as the discord or Reddit giveaway, you can enter in all of them!

I'm very excited for the music and sound design of KSP2. The rocket engine SFX are a huge step up from KSP1, and the soundtrack is spectacular!  I can't wait to visit every celestial body just to experience all the music!
I'm excited for colonies and resource mining.
I'm looking forward to the every improvements  and how i'll be able to mix & match parts to recreate all kinds of spacecrafts

19 minutes ago, Geonovast said:

Some content has been removed.

Please stay on topic, which is what you're excited for in the game.  This is not a complaint thread.  Remember, one entry per person!

 

Please stay on topic.  Suggestions, concerns, grievances, etc, can be taken to the appropriate places in other threads.
I'm most excited for colony and resource management. Looking forward on several ways to transport resources.
I'm looking forward to being able to build actual colonies smoothly without depending on mods. No offense, but even the best ones are quite finicky and RAM-gobbling at times.
I am super excited to try to be one of the first players to complete an Elcano Challenge surface circumnavigation of one of the new orbital bodies when they are added.

I'm excited for multiplayer!  I know it's a ways off, but when it does arrive.. I can't wait to collaborate on exploring, and building out a (hopefully) shared vision for kerbalkind's future.  Or one such of many, anyway.  

And better wheel physics!  Wheel physics have been the bane of my existence in ksp1; hopefully rebuilding ksp from the ground up will cure this ill, and I can finally make good on some of the things I dreamed about doing.
I'm excited about new interstellar travels and visiting new planets
I am excited for colonies and the improved UI.
I'm excited about building some cool looking ships
The prospect of official multiplayer is quite exciting, would love to play with my partner.
I’m excited for the possibility of a KSP3
The optimizations, the colonization and interstellar system.
I am excited for interstellar travel!
I am excited for colonies, sciences and contract that can be in carrer mod of that new opus.

I’m excited for multiplayer, so that I can play with (and/or against!) friends. 
So hyped that the game is finally releasing. Myself and many others have been waiting for years. So glad the day has almost arrived!

I'm pretty excited for the colony system and interstellar travel. I've always loved the idea of interplanetary and interstellar colonization.  I really cannot wait to see what interstellar travel is gonna be like in KSP2. I'm really curious if they're gonna add a terraforming feature for colonies on other planets, I think that would be super awesome.  Can't wait to build cities on the Mün. I also really love the idea of building ships in orbit with massive space stations. That's gonna be super awesome too.  There are so many possibilities. I'm pretty much excited for everything the whole game has to offer.
What a wonderful game! oh my god!
I'm excited about all the things KSP 2 will make me do that I actually won't be able to do in real life, that's KSP 2's major strength!
I can't wait to see how the new engine plumes look in-game!
